title: Cassie poses in nothing but fishnets and heels in sexy pregnancy photo shoot
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Singer and actress Cassie looks sexier than ever in a new pregnancy photo shoot with a twist.

The star, 33, posed in nothing but fishnet tights which went right up over her bump, and black patent stiletto heels.

Her long straight black hair cascades right down to her thighs and her smoky makeup made her look all the more smouldering.

(Image: Instagram)

Cassie uploaded the snap to her Instagram account, and joked that this behind the scenes photo looked better than the ones taken in the professional shoot.

She wrote: "When the shoot didn’t work out, but the BTS did".

Cassie has 6.6 million followers on the app, and the post has already racked up almost half a million likes.

Last month, Cassie married bull rider and fitness instructor Alex Fine, 26.

(Image: Instagram)

They confirmed in June that they were expecting their first child.

Cassie walked down the aisle in an off the shoulder white gown that flowed over her blossoming bump - and an intricate lace veil.

Cassie, 33, and personal trainer Alex, 26, held hands as they said their vows, with Friday Night Lights director Peter Berg acting as officiant.

(Image: Instagram)

Berg posted a photo of the happy couple's big day to Instagram , along with the caption, "By the power vested in me ..... long may you ride!"

They shared their engagement video online, and Alex wrote: This moment will always be so special to me.

"I get to marry my best friend in the whole world. How am I so lucky!"

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

One of the first to congratulate the couple was Cassie's ex Sean Combs, 49, best known as rapper P Diddy.

Cassie and Sean dated for 11 years before they split in 2018.

"Congratulations @Cassie and Alex. I wish you all nothing but love and happiness. God bless," he wrote.
description: The singer and actress looked stunning as she showed off her bump in the risque photo shoot
